title: Greenlight Capital Re Schedules Fourth Quarter and Year End 2017 Financial Results and Conference Call
text:
GRAND CAYMAN, Cayman Islands, Feb. 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Greenlight Capital Re, Ltd. (NASDAQ:GLRE), a specialist property and casualty reinsurer based in the Cayman Islands and Ireland, today announced that it expects to release financial results for the fourth quarter ended December 31, 2017 after the market closes on Tuesday, February 20, 2018. A live conference call to discuss the financial results will be held on Wednesday, February 21, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern time.
Hosting the call and available during the question-and-answer session will be David Einhorn, Chairman of the Board of Directors; Simon Burton, Chief Executive Officer; Tim Courtis, Chief Financial Officer; Brendan Barry, Chief Underwriting Officer and Michael Belfatti, Chief Operating Officer.

About Greenlight Capital Re, Ltd.
Established in 2004, Greenlight Re ( www.greenlightre.ky ) is a NASDAQ listed company with specialist property and casualty reinsurance companies based in the Cayman Islands and Ireland. Greenlight Re provides risk management products and services to the insurance, reinsurance and other risk marketplaces. The Company focuses on delivering risk solutions to clients and brokers by whom Greenlight Re's expertise, analytics and customer service offerings are demanded. With an emphasis on deriving superior returns from both sides of the balance sheet, Greenlight Re manages its assets according to a value-oriented equity-focused strategy that supports the goal of long-term growth in book value per share.
